title: A French prophecy, or, An admonition to the English concerning their near approaching danger and the means to escape it : being a prediction of a gentleman of quality in Languedoc concerning the downfall of the French king ... to which is added a fuller account of Archbishop Usher's prophecy ... / translated from the French copy.
author: Ussher, James, 1581-1656. Prediction concerning a coming persecution of Protestants.
